description:
An unofficial [Chocolatey extension](https://docs.chocolatey.org/en-us/features/extensions) providing helper functions for querying and focusing windows. These functions may be used in Chocolatey install and uninstall scripts by declaring this package a dependency in your package's `.nuspec`.

The most important function is `Use-Window`, which is able to focus a window and bring it to the front. A script can easily switch between windows this way.
displayName: Use-Window extension (helper to focus a window)
summary: Helper functions for querying and switching between windows.
author: foundata
